entries.abort: Fool...do you know who I am? Your superior will be most displeased that you failed in your duty.
entries.arrived_at_loc: Stand by for the arrival of the Inquisitior's shuttle.
entries.attack_notify: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 <Warning! Enemy fighters detected.>
entries.attack_stopped: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 <Enemy fighter wing destroyed.>
entries.complete: The Inquistitor is here. He says you are a fine example of the Empire's best.
entries.failed_destroy: The shuttle has been destroyed! The Inquisition is not going to be pleased with the loss of their man. Report back to your superior.
entries.failed_protect: You left the shuttle on its own! What were you thinking. Make a full report of your failur to your superior.
entries.found_loc: Location of shuttle jump point located. Proceed to location and await further instructions.
entries.goodbye_1: You have done well. Have no worries, I will reveal the truth of why the rebels are in this sector in due time.
entries.goodbye_2: You have done well. Have no worries, I will reveal the truth of why the rebels are in this sector in due time.
entries.goodbye_3: You have done well. Have no worries, I will reveal the truth of why the rebels are in this sector in due time.
entries.goodbye_4: You have done well. Have no worries, I will reveal the truth of why the rebels are in this sector in due time.
entries.goodbye_5: You have done well. Have no worries, I will reveal the truth of why the rebels are in this sector in due time.
entries.hull_half: Our hull is at half strength. Get those fighters off of us.
entries.panic_1: You call this security! Rebels are swarming all over this sector.
entries.panic_2: Rebels! My route was supposed to be secure. There will be some questions.
entries.panic_3: It is time to prove yourself loyal.
entries.panic_4: Do not fail me, pilot! The Emperor himself knows my name.
entries.panic_5: Rebels! My route was supposed to be secure. There will be some questions.
entries.quest_escort_d: Follow and protect the Inquisitior's shuttle as it moves through the system.
entries.quest_location_d: Your orders are to meet the shuttle in the Endor system.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Travel to the shuttle's arrival location and wait for it to show up.
entries.reason_1: I am Inquisition Hizee of the Imperial Inquisition. I will root out the cause of your breach in security. Escort me to headquarters.
entries.reason_2: I am Inquisition Hizee of the Imperial Inquisition. I will root out the cause of your breach in security. Escort me to headquarters.
entries.reason_3: I am Inquisition Hizee of the Imperial Inquisition. I will root out the cause of your breach in security. Escort me to headquarters.
entries.reason_4: I am Inquisition Hizee of the Imperial Inquisition. I will root out the cause of your breach in security. Escort me to headquarters.
entries.reason_5: I am Inquisition Hizee of the Imperial Inquisition. I will root out the cause of your breach in security. Escort me to headquarters.
entries.shields_depleted: There went our shields. We can't hold out much longer!
entries.split_quest_alert: Alert! One of our stolen shuttles has returned to Endorian space. Capture and return that shuttle to headquarters.
entries.taunt_1: You will have to try harder then that!
entries.taunt_2: Give up! We have some questions for YOU!
entries.taunt_4: Prepare to be made into space dust.
entries.taunt_5: Imperial dog! You time is up.
entries.thanks_1: You have done very well! Perhaps you will avoid my questions.
entries.thanks_2: You are proving yourself a loyal soldier to the Empire.
entries.thanks_3: I think you will be a valued asset to my investigation.
entries.thanks_4: I see by your actions that you are loyal.
entries.thanks_5: You and I are going to get along very well, I think.
entries.title: Endor System: Escort the Inquisitor's Shuttle
entries.title_d: The Emperor has sent an Inquisitor to assist Storm Squadron with their investigation into the Bothan and Rebel attacks. It appears that he is concerned there might be an insider assisting the Bothans. You are to escort the Inquisitor's shuttle through the system safely.
